story: I'm a developer, and like you, I was constantly juggling between my tasks. I opened Notion for one idea, Apple Notes for another, a .txt file for my urgent todos...
One day, in the middle of an intense coding session, I lost 15 minutes finding where I had noted an important detail. That's when I realized: the problem isn't organization, it's access.
"What if my to-do list was always exactly one keyboard shortcut away from me?"
I built Todo Overlay for myself first. No account to create, no complex sync, no distractions. Just Shift+Space and there's my list. Shift+Space again, it's gone.
Today, over 10,000 people use it daily. Developers, designers, students, entrepreneurs. All with the same need: capture their thoughts without losing focus.
Todo Overlay is free, ad-free, and will remain so forever. Because productivity should never be a luxury.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Todo Overlay

questions.a: Yes, 100% free. No trial period, no hidden premium version, no ads. Todo Overlay is and will always remain free for everyone.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account?
questions.a: No! That's one of the great advantages of Todo Overlay. Download, install, and you're set. Your data stays on your machine, no account required.

questions.q: Is my data synced between my devices?
questions.a: Currently, Todo Overlay works locally on each machine to ensure speed and privacy. Cloud sync is on our roadmap, but always as an option for those who want it.

questions.q: Which platforms does Todo Overlay run on?
questions.a: Todo Overlay is available on macOS (10.13+), Windows (10+) and Linux (Ubuntu, Fedora, Arch). The app is native on each platform for optimal performance.

questions.q: Can I customize the keyboard shortcut?
questions.a: Absolutely! While Shift+Space is the default shortcut (and recommended for its simplicity), you can customize it in settings according to your preferences.

questions.q: Does it slow down my computer?
questions.a: Not at all. Todo Overlay uses less than 50MB of RAM in the background and has no impact on your system performance. It's optimized to be invisible until you need it.

questions.q: Can I organize my tasks by project or category?
questions.a: Yes! Todo Overlay supports tags, projects, and filters to organize your tasks as you wish. All while keeping the interface simple and fast.

questions.q: What happens if I accidentally close the app?
questions.a: Nothing serious! All your tasks are automatically saved in real time. Even if you restart your computer, everything will be there on next launch.
Not yet, but it's in our plans! For now, Todo Overlay focuses on the desktop experience where keyboard shortcut access speed makes all the difference.

questions.q: How can I contribute or give feedback?
questions.a: We love user feedback! Join our Discord, send us an email, or open an issue on GitHub. All suggestions are welcome.
